dict.string: We use your location to suggest nearby events and personalized content based on your area.
Your location is used to keep you informed about relevant local content, even when the app is not open.
We need access to your camera to allow you to take photos and videos within the app for profile pictures, sharing moments, and more.
We require access to your photo library so you can upload images and videos for profile customization, sharing content, and storing app-generated media.
